text:
Today, Pinhead, from White Watch, had his first Covid Jab at @BootsUK Alfreton.
Huge thanks to Ian and Sophia who were amazing 🥰👍 Pinhead isn't a fan of needles but Ian and Sophia put him at ease and got him vaccinated 😀👍

#COVID19 #CovidVaccine #vaccine #Monday #barnsleychop https://t.co/TFfFF8hHG3
